Soil & Amendments.description: Natural amendments that regenerate and nourish soil health.

Organic Compost.description: Rich, fully decomposed organic matter teeming with life.

Vermicompost.description: Earthworm-processed compost with high nutrient concentration.

Biochar.description: Stable carbon charcoal that improves water retention & sequesters carbon.

Mycorrhizal Fungi.description: Fungal inoculants that boost root nutrient absorption.

Rock Dust.description: Mineral micronutrients from basalt, azomite, and other stone dusts.

Seaweed Extract.description: Organic seaweed concentrate rich in hormones and trace elements.

Organic Mulch.description: Straw, bark or leaf mulch to conserve moisture and suppress weeds.

Green Manures.description: Cover crops grown and incorporated to enhance fertility.

Worm Castings.description: Nutrient-rich granules produced by worm digestion.

Humic & Fulvic Acids.description: Organic acids that improve nutrient uptake and soil structure.

Seeds & Plants.description: Quality seeds and plants tailored to South African permaculture.

Heirloom Seeds.description: Traditional, open-pollinated seeds passed down over generations.

Organic Vegetable Seeds.description: Certified organic vegetable seeds for healthy home gardens.

Organic Herb Seeds.description: Seeds for culinary and medicinal herbs grown organically.

Organic Fruit Tree Saplings.description: Young trees, organically grown, ready for planting.

Indigenous Medicinal Plants.description: Endemic South African plants with traditional healing uses.

Pollinator-Friendly Flower Seeds.description: Flowers seeded to attract bees, butterflies & other pollinators.

Cover Crops Seeds.description: Seeds that protect and replenish soil between main crops.

Endemic South African Plant Seeds.description: Native plant species selected for local permaculture.

Water & Irrigation.description: Efficient systems for capturing, storing and delivering water.

Drip Irrigation Kits.description: Water-saving systems that deliver moisture directly to roots.

Rainwater Harvesting Systems.description: Tanks and fittings to capture and store seasonal rain.

Swales & Contour Tools.description: Guide tools to build earthworks that slow and store run-off.

Mulching Mats.description: Reusable mats for moisture control and weed suppression.

Water Testing Kits.description: Test kits to analyse pH, nutrient levels and quality.

Organic Pesticides.description: Natural pest control agents like neem or pyrethrin.

Beneficial Insects.description: Predatory insects that help manage pests naturally.

Companion Planting Charts.description: Guides for planting combos that deter pests and build soil.

Neem Oil.description: Broad-spectrum botanical pesticide from neem seeds.

BT (Bacillus thuringiensis).description: Biological pesticide targeting caterpillars and worms.

Organic Fungicides.description: Copper and sulphur-based organic disease management.

Chicken Tractors.description: Portable chicken coops that recycle manure directly into beds.
